adrFormatAddress: 875 Park Ave, New York, NY 10075-0341, USA

originalText.text: Extremely satisfied with my recent experience with Dr Glenn Jelks.  Some years ago I had engaged a  plastic surgeon who preformed blepheroplasty, lipostructure , and some small lifts for me of which I endured poor results.  Not only did Dr. Jelks repair what had been done previously, he improved my results dramatically!  His bedside manner was professional and skilled. He spent time with me during my pre-op appointments, post-op visits, and answered all my questions thoroughly. I am most impressed by his attention to detail of his work as well as  his extensive pre-and post op instruction.  The office staff at Jelks Medical is superb. Professional and caring, they ensured my comfort and safety during all aspects of my surgery and follow up. His office manager Gina, was amazing. She helped me navigate through every step of the process and even accommodated my schedule easily when I had to change an appointment at the last minute.  She arranged for me to have a private RN who accompanied me for 2 days after my procedure around the clock to monitor for problems and remind me to follow the instructions to the letter. I would highly recommend Dr. Jelks and his staff to anyone wishing to undergo plastic surgery.

originalText.text: Wow -- I cannot disagree with the last reviewer more.  I could not have had a better experience with the evaluation, office staff, surgery and results.  I had a complicated case of overly wide-open eyes and sagging upper lids and was in need of an upper and lower eyelid surgery and had a few other concerns vis a vis premature aging.   I have a medical background and spoke with five of the top physicians in the field in NYC. I consulted with Dr. Jelks on the recommendation of a world renown retired plastic surgeon and I could not be more thankful.   No one came close to the level of precision in terms of explanation and expectation of results.  I had the eyelid surgery, as well as fat injections to fill out my face and a chin suction and the results were far and above what I expected.  I am also highly inflammatory and have extremely sensitive skin -- so had a few bumps that made me nervous and prompted me to call him more than several times.  He was always prompt and happy to take my calls and explain in detail the process of healing and my particular process, and after two weeks out I looked and felt amazing.  I am now nine months out and I look and feel incredible.  The best part is people will ask me if I have changed my hair or am on a new health kick -- but no one even knows I had plastic surgery.  He is an extremely thoughtful and meticulous surgeon, and his outcomes are to make you look naturally younger -- not artificially enhanced in any way.  Dr. Elizabeth Jelks -- his partner is equally as wonderful and skilled -- and evaluates all occullar surgery candidates.  His staff and office manager Gina are warm, responsive and professional and really worked with my insane schedule to make post-op check ups convenient.   I cannot recommend him enough.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Jelks for many years since I have been very happy with the outcome of all procedures he has done due to his talent and skill level. I initially chose Dr. Jelks based on the recommendation of a family member and have continued to recommend him myself to anyone interested in improving their appearance. Also noted is the excellent pre and post op care given.I highly recommend him as a surgeon.

originalText.text: I did research for years and consulted with various plastic surgeons.  Dr. Jelks did upper and lower lids and corrected ptosis for me.  As a result, I no longer need eyeglasses to drive and have a refreshed, natural look.   He is very conservative about not cutting too much or making skin look stretched out.  Pre and post-surgery care was superb.  The staff is attentive and professional.  Both Dr. Jelks and his nurse, Maureen, have great bedside manners which always put me at ease.

Pre and post-surgery care was superb.  The staff is attentive and professional.  Both Dr. Jelks and his nurse, Maureen, have great bedside manners which always put me at ease.

originalText.text:
Dr. Jelks is a skilled surgeon who is both domestically and internationally respected for his ability to work with patients with complex medical conditions. I first met Dr. Jelks over a decade ago after undergoing extensive surgical reconstruction elsewhere. Sitting in Dr. Jelks' office for the first time, I was very young, and very frightened.  I had previously undergone approximately 25 reconstructive surgeries for a rare genetic condition, all of which were unsuccessful. Dr. Jelks immediately gave me a thorough assessment, evaluation, and most importantly: hope.

A dozen years later, I consider Dr. Glenn Jelks, Dr. Elizabeth Jelks, and his staff an extension of my own family. Without their care, expertise and intervention, I cannot begin to imagine where I would be in terms of my health. Dr. Jelks is the best at what he does, and in a world where we all have a lot of worry and fear, I never feel safer than when I am under his care.
